topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54753e5a63687243a6e30000#post_54753e5a63687243a6e30000
Not being attacked during the transformation is more often justified than not.

In Gaogaigar, There's a swirling tornado thing about The Titular robot during the combination sequence.

In Kamen rider Kabuto, The Initial transformation is pretty quick, And The Rider form transformation involves Debris from the masked form being shot out in all directions.

In Kamen rider Blade, The Thing that the riders need to run through to finish the transformation can knock enemies back.

Etc.
